answers.answer: The baby will be fine... I was borderline preeclampsia when I was pregnant with my first I didn't have a c section scheduled though. .. I went a week past my due date before they decided to induce me... I think everything will turn out fine with you and your baby

I have preeclamplsia. I had it with my first as well and had a csection at 35wks. I had a fantastic recovery and baby only needed 1wk nicu for breathing and feeding, otherwise very healthy and now a happy 15mth old. A couple of days my csection the preeclamplsia was gone and I felt so much better. Wishing you great delivery!

I was borderline for preeclampsia as well. I just had my baby girl 9 days ago. I had a c section at 38 weeks and 2 days. My baby and I are good. I did themmonitoring 2x a week for 8 weeks. Just follow what your DR says and stay on schedule for your monitoring. Listen to your body when you are unsure of what is going on and all  will be well. Prayers and best wishes to you and your baby.
Omg hope all goes well. Good luck and stay positive everything will be ok.

question: Today my doctors office called and said I have preeclampsia, all my tests came back positive for it. I now have a c section scheduled in 10 days and I go to the hospital every other day till then for monitoring. This makes me very nervous. I just want my bub to be ok. Ill be 36 weeks Wednesday.
title: officially have preeclampsia
